mapper.select: select count(mid) from user where uid = #{uid} and status != -1
mapper.sql:
and is_member = #{is_member}
and status = #{status}
and nick like #{nick}
and name like #{name}
and identify like #{identify}
and identify != '' and identify = ''
and mid in (select t.mid from user_tag t where t.tag_id = #{tag_id} and t.uid = #{uid})
and mid not in (select p.mid from platform p where p.uid = #{uid})
and mid in (select p.mid from platform p where p.uid = #{uid} and p.platform = #{platform})
and gender = #{gender}
and mid in not in (select c.mid from user_contact c where c.uid = #{uid} and c.contact_id = 1)
and mid in (select c.mid from user_contact c where c.uid = #{uid} and c.contact_id = 1 and value = #{con_telephone})
and mid in not in (select c.mid from user_contact c where c.uid = #{uid} and c.contact_id = 3)
and mid in not in (select c.mid from user_contact c where c.uid = #{uid} and c.contact_id = 2)
and mid in (select a.mid from user_last_active a where a.uid = #{uid} and a.active_count > 1)
and mid not in (select a.mid from user_last_active a where a.uid = #{uid} and a.active_count > 1)
and mid in not in (select a.mid from user_last_active a where a.uid = #{uid} and a.active_count > 0)
and mid in (select e.mid from user_ext e where e.uid = #{uid} and e.province = #{province})
and mid in (select e.mid from user_ext e where e.uid = #{uid} and e.city = #{city})
and mid in (select e.mid from member e where e.uid = #{uid} and e.member_card_no like #{member_card_no})
and mid in (select e.mid from member e where e.uid = #{uid} and member_point >= #{min_member_point} and #{max_member_point} >= member_point)
and mid in (select a.mid from user_last_active a where a.uid= #{uid} and last_active_time >= #{message_start_time} and #{message_end_time} >= last_active_time)
order by user.mid desc
